privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: How we collect, use, and protect your information

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.description: Our terms and conditions for using the BoxLog service

security.title: Security
security.description: How we protect your data and ensure platform security

cookieConsent.title: We use cookies
cookieConsent.description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze site traffic, and personalize content. By clicking "Accept All", you consent to our use of cookies.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be disabled.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website (Google Analytics).

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.description: Remember your preferences and settings for a personalized experience.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: Currently not used. We prioritize your privacy and don't track for advertising.
